Scenario: A tie with two people and fewer seats remaining.

OPL
2 seats
9 ballots cast
6 candidates

Pike,D    3 votes
Foster,D  2 votes
Deutsch,R 0 votes
Borg,R    2 votes
Jones,R   1 votes
Smith,I   1 votes

Winner [Pike,D]   -- First assigned

Potential Winner [Foster,D]   -- Only ONE of these two will win
Potential Winner [Borg,R]

A tie-breaker is needed in order to assign the remaining seat.
Only one of the potential winners can get the seat.
